ticket.title: URL helpers in functional tests aren't escaping ampersands by default
ticket.original-body:
Given a resource Thing, things_path(:param1 => 123, :param2 => 456) should output "/things/?param1=123&param2=456", however, with 2.0.2, the url helpers in a functional test outputs "/things/?param1=123&param2=456".
The url helpers in ActionPack do it right so this can make tests fail, for example, when using assert_select to test that a form has the right action.
The workaround is to pass :escape_ampersand => true to the named route helper (though that *should* be the default value of escape_ampersand already).
